POINTS - 10
 
Given input b, A and B(where A and B are in base b). Output the product of A and B in base b.
 

Input
Input will be in the order b,A,B (where A and B are in base b)

Output
Print the product of A and B in base b
 

Constraints
2<=b<=10, A and B as well as the product, everything will be below 10^6.

Example
Input:
4 3312 30

Output: 
232020
